channel.title: Hi there, I'm Michael. This forum is excellent!
channel.description:
Hi everyone!
I just discovered this forum the other day. What a great place!
I'm currently building my own self-funded startup (more on that later). I'd love to become better acquainted with all of you. There's a lot I can learn here. I'm currently a senior marketer with 10 years of online experience in campaign strategy and content marketing. If I can be of any help to anyone, just let me know!
Cheers!

item.title: Hi there, I'm Michael. This forum is excellent!
item.dc:creator: tomlloyd
item.description:
Nice to meet you Michael! I’m new too, only posted last week for the first time. Already had some great feedback/insights from the people on here. I’m sure you will too. Interested to hear more about your startup. If I have any marketing q’s I’ll be sure to fire them your way!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi there, I'm Michael. This forum is excellent!

item.title: Hi there, I'm Michael. This forum is excellent!
item.dc:creator: paulyoder
item.description:
Great meeting you Michael. I’m interested in hearing what you’re working on when you have the time share!

Read full topic
